fields.name: Buttercream Cake
fields.description: A Delicious and Tasty Cake. Made fresh each morning by our skilled chefs

fields.name: Double Chocolate Cake
fields.description: A Decadent, Chocolatey Dessert. Made with three layers of semi-sweet chocolate icing, dipped in melted chocolate, and chilled, it is the perfect way to end off your meal

fields.name: Oreo Milkshake
fields.description: A sweet, thick milkshake made with vanilla ice cream, milk, and crushed Oreo cookies. Topped with whipped cream and a bright red maraschino cherry!
